name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange
description:
Embark on a quest to find hidden capybaras with orange (as well as several cats) across four different scenarios. Visit extraordinary cities both during the day and at night.

Hidden Capybaras with Orange include

  • Searching for hidden capybaras: seek capybaras hidden throughout the city
  • 4 unique scenarios, including two daytime and two night scenarios
  • 360 capybaras, 20 cats. Can you find them all?
  • Relaxing music, perfect for searching for capybaras with oranges!

Get ready for an exhilarating journey and nighttime escapades in a city full of capybaras!
